أعد إحياء اختصارات التصفح الكلاسيكية مع BSpace! 🚀

الميزات:

⏪ التنقل باستخدام مفتاح الرجوع: يمكنك العودة بسهولة باستخدام مفتاح الرجوع.
⏩ Shift + Backspace: تقدم بسهولة باستخدام هذا الاختصار.
🚫 قائمة الحظر للنطاقات: قم بتخصيص تجربتك عبر حظر نطاقات معينة.
⌨️ التحكم الذكي في التركيز: لا توجد تدخلات عند الكتابة أو في حقل النص.

لقد قمنا بفحص جميع الإضافات المماثلة بدقة، نسعى لإنشاء التجربة النهائية في التنقل عبر المتصفح والاختصارات.

جرب راحة التصفح الكلاسيكية القديمة مع BSpace!

Introducing "Bspace Backspace", the ultimate tool to streamline your browsing experience and elevate your online journey. 

With Bspace Backspace, you can effortlessly navigate through your browser using the universal backspace key. We have resurrected the classic browsing shortcuts to provide you with a seamless, user-friendly experience. The backspace key becomes your powerful tool, a magic wand that takes you back in your browser with just a simple tap. 

Bspace Backspace comes equipped with the backspace navigation feature. This allows you to easily go back to the previous page with a simple press of the backspace key. No more clicking or scrolling, just one press of the backspace key and voila, you're transported back in time. 

Bspace Backspace doesn't stop at backspace navigation. We also offer Shift + Backspace! This brilliant feature allows you to move forward in your browsing history with the combination of Shift and Backspace keys. Navigate through your browser like never before, using backspace to not only go back but also to move forward.

Bspace Backspace also offers a unique Domain Blocklist. This feature allows you to customize your browsing experience by blocking specific domains. With Bspace Backspace, you have control over your browser and can create a personalized browsing environment, all with the help of the backspace key. 

Our innovative Smart Focus Control feature ensures that your typing experience remains uninterrupted. With Bspace Backspace, there will be no interference when typing or in a text field. The backspace key will only function as a navigation tool when you're not typing, ensuring a smooth and efficient browsing experience.

Bspace Backspace is the result of meticulous research and examination of similar-functioning extensions. We have strived to create the ultimate experience in browser navigation and shortcuts, with the backspace key at the heart of our innovation.

Experience the convenience of old-school browsing with a modern twist. Bspace Backspace takes you back to the simplicity of the past, while keeping you anchored in the advanced technology of the present. The backspace key is no longer just a tool for correcting mistakes, but a powerful key to effortless navigation.

Bspace Backspace is not just a chrome extension, but a revolution in browsing. It's a new way to navigate, to explore, to experience the internet. It's time to take back control of your browser, to make it work for you. And it all starts with the backspace key.

Revive the classic browsing experience with Bspace Backspace. Embrace the backspace key and embark on a seamless browsing journey. Bspace Backspace - the key to effortless navigation.

Introducing "Bspace Backspace Plus", an innovative chrome extension that brings back the classic browsing shortcuts for a seamless and enhanced web navigation experience. 

Bspace Backspace Plus is your ultimate companion for a smooth and effortless browsing experience. This extension is designed to make your web navigation more intuitive, faster, and more enjoyable by restoring the much-loved backspace navigation feature. With Backspace Plus, you can easily go back a page with just the press of the Backspace key, making your browsing experience more efficient and convenient.

We've also added a forward navigation feature to the Backspace Plus. With a simple Shift + Backspace combination, you can effortlessly move forward, making your browsing journey as smooth as possible. This unique feature sets Backspace Plus apart from other similar-functioning extensions.

To make your experience with Backspace Plus even more personalized, we've included a Domain Blocklist feature. This allows you to customize your web navigation by blocking specific domains. No more unwanted content disrupting your browsing experience with Backspace Plus. 

Moreover, Bspace Backspace Plus comes with a Smart Focus Control feature. This means there will be no interference when you are typing or in a text field. Backspace Plus ensures that your typing experience remains uninterrupted and hassle-free.

But what makes Bspace Backspace Plus truly stand out from the crowd is our commitment to perfection. We have thoroughly examined all similar-functioning extensions out there, striving to create the ultimate experience in browser navigation and shortcuts. Backspace Plus is the result of this unwavering dedication to excellence.

Backspace Plus is not just a chrome extension, it's a revolution in browsing. Experience the old-school convenience of browsing with the modern-day efficiency and speed with Backspace Plus. We believe that simple and intuitive navigation is the key to a great browsing experience. And that's exactly what Backspace Plus delivers.

Backspace Plus is all about making your web navigation easier, faster, and better. It is designed to take your browsing experience to the next level. With Backspace Plus, you are in control of your browsing journey. 

So why wait? Step into the future of web navigation with Bspace Backspace Plus. Experience the power of backspace and more with Backspace Plus. 

Join the Backspace Plus revolution today and discover a whole new way of browsing. With Backspace Plus, your web navigation will never be the same again.

Introducing "Bspace Backspace Navigation," the ultimate chrome extension designed to revive classic browsing shortcuts and enhance your online navigation experience. With this extension, backspace navigation becomes a breeze, making it easier than ever to navigate through your browser with a single key.

Bspace Backspace Navigation revolutionizes the way you browse by providing a seamless backspace navigation functionality. With just the simple press of the backspace key, you can effortlessly go back to the previous page. No more fumbling with the mouse or searching for the tiny back arrow. With Bspace Backspace Navigation, the power of browser navigation is literally at your fingertips.

But backspace navigation is not the only feature that Bspace Backspace Navigation offers. With the combination of Shift + Backspace, you can effortlessly move forward through your browser pages. This shortcut is a game-changer, simplifying your browsing experience and saving you precious time. Bspace Backspace Navigation is all about making your online journey as smooth and efficient as possible.

What's more, Bspace Backspace Navigation gives you the power to customize your browsing experience. With the Domain Blocklist feature, you can block specific domains that you don't want to navigate using the backspace key. This is backspace navigation at its finest, tailored to your specific needs and preferences.

With Bspace Backspace Navigation, you never have to worry about accidental interference when typing or in a text field. Our Smart Focus Control ensures that backspace navigation will not interfere with your typing. This means you can confidently type away, knowing that a single backspace will not disrupt your flow.

Bspace Backspace Navigation is not just another chrome extension. We have thoroughly examined all similar-functioning extensions, striving to create the ultimate experience in browser navigation and shortcuts. This careful analysis has resulted in a backspace navigation tool that is superior in functionality and user-friendly design.

Experience the old-school convenience of browsing with Bspace Backspace Navigation. This extension brings back the simplicity and efficiency of backspace navigation, making your browsing experience more enjoyable and less frustrating. With Bspace Backspace Navigation, you can navigate with ease and precision.

Bspace Backspace Navigation is the extension you never knew you needed, but once you start using it, you'll wonder how you ever browsed without it. The backspace navigation functionality is a game-changer, simplifying your online journey and giving you more control over your browsing experience.

Don't settle for complicated browsing when you can have the simplicity and efficiency of backspace navigation with Bspace Backspace Navigation. This chrome extension is a must-have for anyone who spends a significant amount of time online. 

Join the revolution and experience the power of backspace navigation with Bspace Backspace Navigation. This is not just an upgrade to your browsing experience; it's a complete transformation. Bspace Backspace Navigation is here to make your online journey smoother, faster, and more enjoyable. Don't miss out on this amazing chrome extension. Give Bspace Backspace Navigation a try today!

BSpace ಜೊತೆ ಹಳೆಯ ಶಾಲೆಯ ಸೌಕರ್ಯವನ್ನು ಬ್ರೌಸ್ ಮಾಡುವ ಅನುಭವವನ್ನು ಪಡೆಯಿರಿ!

BSpace ഉപയോഗിച്ച് പഴയ ക്ലാസിക്ക് ബ്രൗസിംഗ് ഷോർട്ട്‌കട്ടുകൾ പുനർജീവിപ്പിക്കുക! 🚀

സവിശേഷതകൾ:

⏪ ബാക്സ്പേസ് നാവിഗേഷൻ: ബാക്സ്പേസ് കീ ഉപയോഗിച്ച് എളുപ്പത്തിൽ പിന്നോട്ട് പോകുക.
⏩ ഷിഫ്റ്റ് + ബാക്സ്പേസ്: ഈ ഷോർട്ട്‌കട്ട് ഉപയോഗിച്ച് തിരിച്ചു മുന്നോട്ട് നീങ്ങുക.
🚫 ഡൊമൈൻ ബ്ലോക്ക്‌ലിസ്റ്റ്: പ്രത്യേക ഡൊമൈനുകൾ ബ്ലോക്ക് ചെയ്ത് നിങ്ങളുടെ അനുഭവം ഇച്ചരിക്കുക.
⌨️ സ്മാർട്ട് ഫോക്കസ് നിയന്ത്രണം: ടൈപ്പിംഗ് അല്ലെങ്കിൽ ടെക്സ്റ്റ് ഫീൽഡിൽ ഉള്ളപ്പോൾ ഞെട്ടുകാട്ടലില്ല.

ഞങ്ങൾ സമാന പ്രവർത്തനം പ്രവർത്തിപ്പിക്കുന്ന എല്ലാ എക്സ്റ്റെൻഷനുകളും പരിശോധിച്ചു, ബ്രൗസർ നാവിഗേഷൻയും ഷോർട്ട്‌കട്ടുകളിലും അത്യുത്തമ അനുഭവം സൃഷ്ടിക്കാനായി ശ്രമിച്ചു.

BSpace ഉപയോഗിച്ച് പഴയ ക്ലാസിക്ക് ബ്രൗസിംഗിന്റെ സൗകര്യം അനുഭവപ്പെടുക!

BSpace உடன் பழைய உலாவல் குறுக்குவழிகளை மீட்புக! 🚀

அம்சங்கள்:

⏪ Backspace உலாவல்: Backspace விசையை பயன்படுத்தி எளிதாக முன்னே செல்லலாம்.
⏩ Shift + Backspace: இந்த குறுக்குவழி மூலம் எளிதாக முன்னே செல்லலாம்.
🚫 டொமைன் தடைப்பட்டியல்: குறிப்பிட்ட டொமைன்களை தடை செய்து உங்கள் அனுபவத்தை தனிப்படுத்தி வாழ்க்கையை மேம்படுத்தலாம்.
⌨️ ஸ்மார்ட் போக்கஸ் கட்டுப்பாடு: தட்டியை அல்லது உரை புலத்தில் எழுதும்போது குழப்பம் இல்லை.

உலாவி வழிகாட்டி மற்றும் குறுக்குவழிகளில் மிகச்சிறந்த அனுபவத்தை உருவாக்குவதற்கு, அதே வகையான அதிக அம்சங்களை கொண்ட அனைத்து நீட்டிப்புகளையும் ஆய்வு செய்துவந்தோம்.

BSpace உடன் பழைய பாடல் உலாவலின் வசதியை அனுபவிக்கவும்!

లక్షణాలు:

⏪ బ్యాక్స్పేస్ నావిగేషన్: బ్యాక్స్పేస్ కీతో సులభంగా వెనకి వెళ్లండి.
⏩ Shift + Backspace: ఈ షార్ట్ కట్తో అవిశ్రాంతంగా ముందుకు సాగండి.
🚫 డొమైన్ బ్లాక్ లిస్ట్: ప్రత్యేక డొమైన్లను నిరోధించి మీ అనుభవాన్ని అనుకూలీకరించండి.
⌨️ స్మార్ట్ ఫోకస్ నియంత్రణ: టైపు చేసేటప్పుడు లేదా టెక్స్ట్ ఫీల్డ్లో ఉన్నప్పుడు అడ్డం లేదు.

మేము అన్ని సాధారణ కార్యాచరణ ఉన్న పొడిగింపులను తెలికగా పరిశీలించాము, బ్రౌజర్ నావిగేషన్ మరియు షార్ట్ కట్లో పరమ అనుభవాన్ని సృష్టించడానికి ప్రయత్నిస్తున్నాము.

BSpace తో పాత విధానంలో బ్రౌజింగ్ సౌకర్యాన్ని అనుభవించండి!
